description:
Linux Lite 7.0 distribution is now available for public testing with a Release Candidate version based on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS and Xfce 4.18. Here’s what’s else is new!

The post Linux Lite 7.0 Is Now Available for Testing, Based on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS and Xfce 4.18 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Linux Lite 7.0 Is Now Available for Testing, Based on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS and Xfce 4.18

description:
A list of 10 things you can perform after installing Fedora 40 Workstation Edition. A curated list just for you of this release.

The post 10 Things to Do After Installing Fedora 40 (Workstation) appeared first on Linux Today.
title: 10 Things to Do After Installing Fedora 40 (Workstation)

description:
Linux hardware vendor TUXEDO Computers announced today the TUXEDO Stellaris 17 Gen6 Linux-powered laptop with an updated Intel Core i9 series processor.

The post TUXEDO Stellaris 17 Gen6 Linux Laptop Launches with Intel Core i9-14900HX appeared first on Linux Today.
title: TUXEDO Stellaris 17 Gen6 Linux Laptop Launches with Intel Core i9-14900HX

description:
Experience Shotcut 24.04’s powerful new features, such as rollback and customizable time formats, for video editing.

The post Shotcut 24.04 Brings Surround Sound Encoder and Customizable Time Formats appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Shotcut 24.04 Brings Surround Sound Encoder and Customizable Time Formats
